name: GLMap
summary: Framework for rendering your own vector maps using a unique style with OpenGL
description:
The GLMap framework has been built to allow you to easily integrate an offline map into any iOS application.

Features:
* Map rendering is performed directly on GPU
* MapCSS-based rules allows map to be rendered with different styles
* Displaying your specific geodata (points, lines and polygons) on a map
* Online and offline mode support
